txt.en: Reclaimed Warstang's pouch from a Guaradan thief
Warstang, the Eglan-burglar staying with the dwarves at Zigilgund, has had his belt-pouch burgled from him.

'I do not believe this, and it is a bit embarrasing, honestly, but... someone has gone and stolen my belt-pouch! A burglar burgled -- I shall not soon live this down.

'If I had to guess, I would put the money I do not have anymore on the thief being a Gauradan. There are not many beasts around here with thumbs to unhook a pouch. I wonder if they train up to burgle, too...?

'But look here, I need my pouch! Will you help me again? You can find the Gauradan thieves out in the wastes to the south-east of Zigilgund.'
The Gauradan thieves can be found south-east of Zigilgund.\n\nWarstang has asked you to recover his stolen belt-pouch from the Gauredain.

'Wait, my pouch is here. So what is hiding in this pouch...?

'Oh dear, this is not mine: it is the Guaradan thief's pouch! I had best not look inside it. I really do not wish to know what a Guaradan keeps in his pouch.

'Thank you for your efforts anyway, [placeholder]! The least I can do is give you a little from my own pouch....'
Warstang is currently residing in Zigilgund.\n\nYou should return the belt-pouch to Warstang.
'Have you found my pouch yet? No? Well, keep looking, then! The Gauredain are found to the south-east of here.'
Reclaim Warstang's pouch from a Gauradan thief
Reclaim Warstang's pouch from a Guaradan thief
